.auto-claude/specs/002-add-json-file-con.description: Implementation plan for JSON connector with 5 phases: Package Setup, Core Implementation, Testing, Integration, Validation. Includes 16 subtasks with estimated times. Key pattern: extend FileSourceConnector like CSV connector, flatten nested JSON using dot-notation.

packages/connector-json/package.json.description: Created connector-json package with standard DashFrame connector structure. Dependencies: @dashframe/core, @dashframe/engine, @dashframe/engine-browser, apache-arrow. Follows exact pattern from connector-csv.
